revised_title: Investigations on the Spectrum of Bromine - I: Structure of Br III
tldr: The authors conducted an extensive investigation on the spectrum of bromine, focusing on the structure of Br III. They identified important quartet and doublet terms and provided a thorough analysis of the spectrum, which was challenging due to the overlapping multiplets and unique electronic configuration of bromine. This study contributes to the understanding of atomic physics and the properties of heavy elements.
